reviewText:
Although they are very long, they fit into most any writing class.  Some are better than others.  One serious problem: These videos are not available with closed caption. These are the only educational videos that I have seen that doesn't have this function.

The length of the videos are not a problem for an online course.  I had one online student who noted that the videos were wonderful and the best learning experience she had in improving her writing skills.

I bought this entire series of DVDs.

If you find research methods boring, this instructional dvd will do nothing to change your opinion.

If you only grasp and remember 30% of each video, you will know more about the subject than you can possibly imagine.

I use these instructional dvds all the time.  Exciting?  No.  Informative?  VERY !
